summary: An agoraphobic father teams up with a renegade priest to save his daughter from the clutches of a gang of twisted feral children who committed an act of violence against his family years earlier.
cast: Wunmi Mosaku|James Cosmo|Aneurin Barnard|Amy Shiels|Ian Hanmore|Ingrid Craigie|Chris Hegarty|Pete Murphy|Charlie Graham|Jake Wilson|Matthew Workman|Harry Saunders|Elizabeth Brady|Sarah Haworth|Scott Mckenzie|Grant Morrison|James Ramsay|Christopher Warbrick|Arlowe Saunders|Connor McGroary|Sandra McFadden|Agnes Grout|Liam Finnigan|Ronnie Johnson|Alexander McIntyre|Keith Hutcheson
title: Citadel
